==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|神|仏}}

===Etymology===
From {{m|ja|神|sc=Jpan|tr=shin||god}} + {{m|ja|仏|sc=Jpan|tr=butsu||Buddha}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|しんぶつ}}
# [[god]]s and [[Buddha]]
# [[Shinto]] and [[Buddhism]]

====Derived terms====
* [[神仏混淆]] (''shinbutsu konkō''): mixture of Buddhism and Shinto
* [[神仏習合]] (''shinbutsu jūgō''): syncretism of Shinto and Buddhism
* [[神仏分離]] (''shinbutsu bunri''): separation of Buddhism and Shinto
* [[神仏同体説]] (''shinbutsu-dōtaisetsu''): kami-buddha syncretization theory
